## Chess.deleteNode() method

Delete a node and its children from the tree. Cannot delete the root node.

**Signature:**

```typescript
deleteNode(key?: string | number[]): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string \| number\[\] | _(Optional)_ FEN string or node indices, defaults to the current position |

**Returns:**

boolean
